title: Commonwealth Review. No. 12
brief_description: Cinemagzine containing the following items: Surfboard riding off the coast of Australia; Trout hatcheries in Western Australia; Copper mining in Northern Rhodesia; The manufacture of oil-filled cables in Britain; A British tractor designed for use in the paddy fields of Ceylon; A football match between Ministers and Diplomats in Tanganyika; The building of a Maori meeting house in New Zealand and carnival day in the West Indies.
